
About
=====

There is a video tutorial that can be usefull. 

Any question about the tool, please, send me an email: amziesemerj (at) inf.ufrgs.br


.. raw:: html

        <object width="480" height="385">
        	<param 
        		name="movie"
        		value="http://www.youtube.com/v/IFbCDSMi_FE&hl=en_US&fs=1&rel=0">
        	</param>
        	<param 
        		name="allowFullScreen" value="true">
        	</param>
        	<param 
        		name="allowscriptaccess" 
        		value="always">
        	</param>
        	<embed 
        		src="http://www.youtube.com/v/IFbCDSMi_FE&hl=en_US&fs=1&rel=0"
        		type="application/x-shockwave-flash" 
        		allowscriptaccess="always"
        		allowfullscreen="true" 
        		width="480"
        		height="385">
        	</embed>
        </object>

|
